sentences.en: "You really won't tell?" she asked, begging for reassurance.
sentences.cn: “你真的不说吗？”她问道，乞求得到安慰。

sentences.en: Her son used sign language to tell her what happened.
sentences.cn: 她儿子用手语告诉她发生了什么事。

sentences.en: His friends say he was always quick to tell a joke.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友们说，以前他讲笑话总是张嘴就来。

sentences.en: I can't tell you how glad I was to leave that place.
sentences.cn: 我无法形容自己离开那个地方心里有多高兴。

sentences.en: I tell you what, why don't we meet for lunch tomorrow?.
sentences.cn: 你听我说，为什么明天我们不碰头一块儿吃午餐呢？。

sentences.en: I'll have them paged and tell them you're here.
sentences.cn: 我会叫人呼他们，告诉他们你在这儿。

sentences.en: I’ll tell you all about it when I get back.
sentences.cn: 我回来再告诉你这一切。

sentences.en: I'm not with you. Tell me what you mean.
sentences.cn: 我不明白你说的话，告诉我你是什么意思。

sentences.en: Just pipe down and I'll tell you what I want.
sentences.cn: 别说了，我来告诉你我想要什么。

sentences.en: She scribbled a note to tell Mum she'dgone out.
sentences.cn: 她匆匆写了个便条告诉妈妈她已外出。

sentences.en: She tells me her troubles. I tell her mine.
sentences.cn: 我和她互相倾诉烦恼。

sentences.en: She would have liked to tell him to butt out.
sentences.cn: 她本想告诉他叫他别插手的。

sentences.en: Sheppard was telling the truth .
sentences.cn: 谢泼德说的是实话。

sentences.en: So tell me what this molecule does that makes it special.
sentences.cn: 那么告诉我这个分子有何作用而使其与众不同。

sentences.en: Tell me about your clinical trials. How did they go?
sentences.cn: 跟我说说你的临床试验。进展如何？

sentences.en: that took me by surprise, I can tell you!.
sentences.cn: 确实，那使我深感意外！。

sentences.en: the worried expression on Helen's face told its own tale.
sentences.cn: 海伦脸上焦急的表情不言而喻。

sentences.en: They drummed it into her that she was not to tell anyone.
sentences.cn: 他们反复告诫她，让她不要告诉任何人。

sentences.en: When your children misbehave tell them without making them feel small.
sentences.cn: 孩子表现不佳时要让他们知道，但不能让他们自惭形秽。

sentences.en: You never can tell what life is going to bring you.
sentences.cn: 你永远不知道人生会给你带来些什么。

words.tran_cn: （美）出纳员；讲述者；讲故事者；计票员

phrases.phrase: as far as one can tell
phrases.tran_cn: 根据现有的消息来判断
我的主张（或意见、建议）是…；你听我说…

phrases.phrase: I tell you (或 I can tell you)

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)如实说来，实事求是地说，说实话
不言而喻，显而易见，不言自明
(非正式)我早知道了；还用你告诉我
(非正式)不见得吧；我不相信；哪有这种事，别胡说
n. 威廉泰尔（罗西尼所作歌剧，等于Tell William）

trans.tran_cn: (Tell)人名；(英、德、瑞典)特尔；(罗、意)泰尔；(阿拉伯)塔勒

trans.tran_en: if someone tells you something, they communicate information, a story, their feelings etc to you

trans.tran_cn: [told-told] 讲， 告诉； 吩咐， 命令； 说明， 显示； 分辨， 区分
trans.tran_en: if someone tells you something, they communicate information, a story, their feelings etc to you

trans.tran_cn: 泄密，告发，（颜色、声音等）显示，识别
分辨，辨别，告诉，吩咐，泄漏，保证
